name: My Solar System Proyect
description:
For this Solar System proyect i decided to include:

- Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, the Sun, the Moon, a comet spawner (which creates a comet that goes across the screen) and a "blackhole".

- The orbits follow a somewhat realistic trayectory and the planets, sun and comets have 3D sound.

-There seems to be a problem with the audio in the WebGL application, I have been trying to figure out what the problem is but all it says in the Inspector panel for each planet is "Missing audio clip" when i view the possible audio files, it is completely empty. I have been looking around in forums and other places to figure out what's wrong but I can't seem to figure it out. The worst part is that just before creating the builds for each platform, it worked perfectly in Unity, sounds and all, also I tried to create again the build in my backup but it seems it corrupted the back-up files again. I followed every single step on the course but for some reason just when I was about to submit it here, the audio broke. If I manage to fix it I will reupload another version.

Thanks for your understanding

Credits:

Created by Jaime Díez-Hochleitner Suárez
